headline: GE Vernova explores sale of Proficy software unit, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Following its independence last year after a three-way split of General Electric, GE Vernova is benefiting from surging domestic power demand.  The company is working with advisers and has reached out to industrial software firms and private equity investors, according to Bloomberg.

summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the Jim Cramer Says Trump’s Angry At Everybody & Discusses These 11 Stocks. GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is an American industrial equipment company that has benefited from investor attention due to its ability to manufacture nuclear power generation equipment. headline: GE Aerospace: Too Much Hype, Upside Is Slim
summary: GE Aerospace may have 'limited upside' despite post-COVID growth, key engine projects, and challenges like China's COMAC C919 threat. Read more on GE stock.

summary: Parnassus Investments, an investment management company, released the “Parnassus Growth Equity Fund” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here.
